definition: to receive heaven's command (of Daoist immortals etc)/ordained by heaven
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: You've just met that special person.
sentences.chinese: 你遇到的就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: Maybe you can find your Mr. Right.
sentences.chinese: 也許你會找到你的真命天子呢。

sentences.english: Mr. Great may be right in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 真命天子可能就在眼前。

sentences.english: Hi, I'm Mr. Right. Someone said you were looking for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我叫真命天子，聽說你在找我。

sentences.english: No doubt about it, this is your soul mate.
sentences.chinese: 別懷疑，他就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: No doubt about it , this is your soul mate .
sentences.chinese: 別懷疑，他就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: The right woman can make a frog turn into a prince.
sentences.chinese: 真命天女會讓青蛙變王子。

sentences.english: And eternally i would find the daughter of dragon of mine.
sentences.chinese: 我終將發現我的真命天女，所以我不會一直一個人。

sentences.english: No one would label Putin a child of destiny.
sentences.chinese: 沒人會把普京稱爲“真命天子”。

sentences.english: And she has one simple reason for selecting her Mr Right.
sentences.chinese: 對於真命天子的選擇，她的理由十分簡單。

sentences.english: Chieko eventually find their right man to be happy it?
sentences.chinese: 最終千惠能找到自己的真命天子獲得幸福麼？

sentences.english: You are my destiny . You share my reverie .
sentences.chinese: 妳是我的真命天女，妳分享我的夢想。

sentences.english: Besides, you're going to have several girlfriends before you find “the one.”
sentences.chinese: 另外，在找到真命天女之前你可能會有好幾個女朋友。

sentences.english: Once I loved a man who I thought the gods themselves had sent me.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經愛過一個我以爲是衆神派來給我的真命天子。

definition: good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
matchmaker/go-between/same as 月下老人[yue4 xia4 lao3 ren2]
to have luck with the ladies (idiom)
